unnormalised: I remember using a mental health app after a stressful semester at IIT Delhi. It helped me practice mindfulness, like focusing on my breath during morning chai. Honestly, it felt like a real-life "Dear Zindagi" moment. While not a complete cure, it definitely gave me tools to manage my anxiety during exams. Give it a try, maybe it'll work for you too!
